overview: Maya, a 13 year old cyberporn model, is abducted by a hideous river monster. She manages to escape and returns home to tell her mother, Claire, about it. Claire thinks her daughter is lying and in a fit of anger pushes the poor girl down the stairs. That night Maya sneaks out while her mother is asleep and returns to the monster waiting for her at the river. Days later after Maya was buried, Claire unearths her daughterâ€™s grave only to find no dead body inside the coffin - only flowers.
title: Mga Buwak Para Ni Maya
